text: The Critique of Judgment examines aesthetic judgment and teleological judgment. Kant explores how we make judgments about beauty and the purposiveness of nature.
《判断力批判》考察审美判断和目的论判断。康德探讨我们如何对美和自然的目的性做出判断。
The Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals is Kant's introductory work to his moral philosophy. It develops the concept of the categorical imperative as the fundamental principle of morality.
Die Grundlegung zur Metaphysik der Sitten ist Kants Einführung in seine Moralphilosophie. Sie entwickelt den Begriff des kategorischen Imperativs als grundlegendes Prinzip der Moral.
